price: 30. isin caagiidak hcbeltö caagidiy faxxaana manton, Yalli faxeh akke waytek, diggah Yalli isi ginö caaloota yaaxigi, abba haamal naggaar kinni.
arabic: وَمَا تَشَآءُونَ إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā tashāūna illā an yashāa al-lahu inna al-laha kāna ʿalīman ḥakīman
